```{r setup, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
suppressPackageStartupMessages({
  library(tidyverse)
  library(lubridate)
  library(modelr)
  library(broom)
  library(lmtest)
  library(sandwich)
  library(viridis)
})
# Chunk opsjonene satt nedenfor er for mitt bruk
# Gj√∏r at jeg kan holde noen av kortene skjult ;-)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, include = FALSE)
```


```{r henter pm2 filen}
pm2 <- read_csv("data/pm2.csv", show_col_types = FALSE)
```


```{r mutatet og string}
pm2 <- pm2 %>% 
  mutate(
    fnr = str_sub(knr, 1,2),
    aar_f = str_sub(aar)
  )
```


```{r ser paa head}
head(pm2)
```


```{r parsefactor}
pm2 %>% 
  mutate(
    fnr = parse_factor(fnr, levels = fnr),
    aar_f = parse_factor(aar_f, levels = aar_f)
  )
```


```{r mutate og select}
pm2 <- pm2 %>% 
  mutate(
    Trade_pc_100K = Trade_p/100000
  ) 
```

```{r head}
head(pm2, n = 4)
```

# Modell

```{r}
mod1 <- 'pm2 ~ aar_f + Total_ya_p + inc_k1 + inc_k5 + uni_k_mf + uni_l_mf + Trade_pc_100K'
```


```{r}
lm1 <- lm(mod1, data = pm2, subset = complete.cases(pm2))
```

```{r}
summary(lm1)
```
